FTGLExtrdFont Class Reference

#include <FTGLExtrdFont.h>

Inheritance diagram for FTGLExtrdFont:

Detailed Description

FTGLExtrdFont is a specialisation of the FTFont class for handling extruded Polygon fonts.

See also:
FTFont

FTGLPolygonFont
